about_the_game:
Help a population that has fled the incessant storms, ravaging the previous world, to rebuild and survive.

The intensive use of an ever more polluting industry being the cause, will you make different decisions, or will you follow the same path?

Food having become a currency as valuable as money, you will have to develop your city by taking care of the general satisfaction of the population, these food needs, and thus become a seller of food products on a large scale.

Sectors of activity

  • Agriculture: sowing and harvesting fields of cereals, fruits and vegetables, and raising farm animals for food resources.

  • Industry: build, piece by piece, automated lines of industrial machines dedicated to the mass production of food products.

  • Commerce: generate income in the city's points of sale, such as the market, by building stalls, and retail agricultural resources and finished products coming out of the factories. and benefit from the help associated with the various buildings administrative for better economic management.

  • Various resources: collect oil, water and produce electricity via power stations or wind turbines.

Miscellaneous buildings

  • Research and development: the main tree that allows you to evolve through the ages. New constructions, technologies and various improvements.

  • Job Center: Automates most tasks as the city grows, and provides some bonuses or improvements. Design office: discover new automated line plans and improve them.

  • Protection Factory: Make protection tools to help the population cope with storms.

Weather effects

  • As you progress, you will have to defy unpredictable weather and even devastating storms. You will have to act differently depending on the weather in different sectors of activity.

  • A pollution system will increase the occurrence of storms and their durations.

As the game is in development, new gameplay and future descriptions will be provided later.

Food Industry is planned soon for May 2025, and will be released in Early-Access, which will mainly allow to add and modify gameplay, repair bugs, update graphics and new maps.

Preview of Food Industry coming soon > City-Builder Festival on Steam Marsh 2025

name: Food Industry

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960, Radeon RX 570 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

reviews:
“Food Industry looks fantastic!”
Indie Game Fan
short_description: Build and expand in agriculture, industry and commerce. Evolve in the food industry sector, and weather the storms by helping your people build the new world.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese
